snippet: President Abdelaziz Bouteflika, who was hospitalized for months last year after a stroke, has been admitted to a French hospital in the city of Grenoble, news agencies reported Friday, citing French police officials.
abstract: President Abdelaziz Bouteflika of Algeria has been admitted to a French hospital in the city of Grenoble.
lead_paragraph: President Abdelaziz Bouteflika, who was hospitalized for months last year after a stroke, has been admitted to a French hospital in the city of Grenoble, news agencies reported Friday, citing French police officials.

headline.main: Algeria: President Hospitalized in France, Reports Say
headline.print_headline: Algeria: President Hospitalized in France, Reports Say
